forensics_hardening_impl.title: [Forensics] Core Integrity Hardening (TDD)
forensics_hardening_impl.instruction_raw: Implement the hardening fixes specified in 'gemini-output/spec/MISSION_forensics_regression_tests_SPEC.md'. Focus on: 1. EscheatmentHandler safe metadata access. 2. Saga DTO validation and orchestrator rejection of incomplete sagas. 3. SettlementSystem dynamic agent resolution. 4. FinanceSystem liquidity checks for bond issuance. Ensure all tests in 'tests/forensics/' pass after implementation.
